channel.title: CVE Feed for WebToffee -- WordPress Comments Import & Export
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WebToffee -- WordPress Comments Import & Export

item.title: CVE-2024-7514|2024-10-11T08:30:45.127Z -- webtoffee -- wordpress%20comments%20import%20%26%20export
item.description: The WordPress Comments Import & Export plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to to arbitrary file read due to insufficient file path validation during the comments import process, in versions up to, and including, 2.3.7. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to read the contents of arbitrary files on the server, which can contain sensitive information. The issue was partially fixed in version 2.3.8 and fully fixed in 2.3.9
